net.sf.mmm.util.validation.base

Class ComposedValidationFailure

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.util.lang.base.AbstractMessage
      • net.sf.mmm.util.validation.base.AbstractValidationFailure
        • net.sf.mmm.util.validation.base.ComposedValidationFailure
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Iterable<ValidationFailure>, AttributeReadMessage, AttributeReadMessageCode, AttributeReadUuid, Message, ValidationFailure

    public class ComposedValidationFailure
extends AbstractValidationFailure
implements Iterable<ValidationFailure>
    This is an implementation of ValidationFailure that represents the composition of other ValidationFailures.
    Since:
    3.1.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public String getDetails()

      • getMessage

        public String getMessage(Locale locale)
        Description copied from interface: Message
        This method gets the message localized for the given Locale.
        ATTENTION:
        This method is designed for server applications with NLS. On client side (e.g. for GWT clients) only a single locale may be supported at a time and this method may behave like AttributeReadMessage.getMessage() ignoring the Locale.
        Specified by:
        getMessage in interface Message
        Specified by:
        getMessage in interface ValidationFailure
        Overrides:
        getMessage in class AbstractMessage
        Parameters:
        locale - is the Locale.
        Returns:
        the message.
